item.title: AWS Basic Terminologies
item.description: Terminology credits : intellipaat.com Networking Services VPC: Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) is a virtual data center in AWS consisting of a set of isolated resources. Direct Connect: It is used to establish a dedicated network connection from the host network to AWS without an Internet connection. Route 53: It is a scalable and highly available Domain Name System (DNS) and domain name registration service, and 53 is the port on which this service runs.
